tool.name: HydroDEM

param.name: Workspace
param.dialogReference: Geodatabase workspace to read inputs and write outputs to.

param.name: huc8cov
param.dialogReference: Polygon feature class to use as the outer-wall during hydro-enforcement.

param.name: dendrite
param.dialogReference: Hydrography stream dendrite feature class for use in burning during hydro-enforcement. Often called NHDFlowline.

param.name: snap_grid
param.dialogReference: Snapping grid for use in rasterization of vector datasets. Often the same as origdem.

param.name: bowl_polys
param.dialogReference: Bowling water body grid, produced by Bathymetric Gradient Setup. Often called nhd_wbg.

param.name: bowl_lines
param.dialogReference: Bowling line grid, produced by Bathymetric Gradient Setup. Often called wb_srcg.

param.name: inwall
param.dialogReference: Inwall feature class used to create inner walls between sub-basins during hydro-enforcement. Often called inwall_edit.

param.name: cellSize
param.dialogReference: Cell size to use during rasterization of vector datasets, defaults to 10. Units are the same as the horizontal units in the projected origdem.

param.name: drainplug
param.dialogReference: Drain plug feature class used to plug sinks during hydro-enforcement. Often called sinkpoint_edit.

param.name: buffdist
param.dialogReference: Distance to buffer the outer-wall, units the same as the horizontal units of the projected origdem.

param.name: inwallbuffdist
param.dialogReference: Distance to buffer the inner walls, units the same as the horizontal units of the projected origdem.

param.name: inwallht
param.dialogReference: Height to make the inner walls in addition to the underlying land surface elevation. units the same as the vertical units of the projected origdem.

param.name: outwallht
param.dialogReference: Height to make the outer-walls in addition to the underlying land surface elevation. units the same as the vertical units of the projected origdem.

param.name: agreebuf
param.dialogReference: Agree buffer smoothing distance. Units same as the horizontal units of the projected origdem.

param.name: agreesmooth
param.dialogReference: Agree smoothing height. Units same as the vertical units of the projected origdem.

param.name: agreesharp
param.dialogReference: Agree sharp drop height. Units same as the vertical units of the projected origdem.

param.name: bowldepth
param.dialogReference: Depth to bowl the origdem below the original elevation of the land surface. Units are the same as the vertical units of the projected origdem.

tool.summary:
Hydro-enforce the input DEM based on outer-wall and inwall datasets and bathymetric gradient information supplied. After hydro-enforcement, flow direction and flow accumulation grids are computed. This tool is made to run on local folders based on hydrologic units. The flow accumulation grids in these local folders can be adjusted using the next tool after successful hydro-enforcement on all the local folders in a domain.

Complete documentation can be found at XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: Hydro-enforce the input DEM based on outer-wall and inwall datasets and bathymetric gradient information supplied. After hydro-enforcement, flow direction and flow accumulation grids are computed. This tool is made to run on local folders based on hydrologic units. The flow accumulation grids in these local folders can be adjusted using the next tool after sucessful hydro-enforcement on all the local folders in a domain.
